metadata.title: CVE-2019-15232 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Live555 before 2019.08.16 has a Use-After-Free becauseGenericMediaServer::createNewClientSessionWithId can generate the sameclient session ID in succession, which is mishandled by the MPEG1or2 andMatroska file demultiplexors.

criterions.comment: liblivemedia package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
